name: check
description:
NAME
CHECK - check connections components, euler, bipartite, full bipartite current graph

SYNOPSIS
CHECK [-h]
CHECK -c|-e|-b|-f graphname

DESCRIPTION
CHECK checks graph properties using one of four methods: connected components, euler cycle, bipartite or full bipartite check.
Example of connected components:
Yes, you're right!
Example of euler graph:
No, this graph doesn't have Euler cycle
Example of bipartite graph:
Yes, current graph is bipartite graph

COMMAND-LINE OPTIONS
-h, --help - option that shows this text.
-c, --connected-components - check your connected components.
-e, --euler_graph - check your graph on Euler's graph.
-b, --bipartite_graph - check your graph on bipartite.
-f, --full_bipartite_graph - check your graph on full bipartite.
